attributes.action: ensure the proposed £25 London Congestion Charge should not apply to existing vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would be an inequitable and unreasonable charge.  Also, it may increase pollution to the extent that residents in the charging zones are forced (in the knowledge of an annual charge of almost £6,500) to sell their vehicles to rural owners with a much higher annual mileage. 
The £25 charge, if applied at all (which is opposed), should not be
borne by those who purchased their vehicles without the knowledge that such a charge would be introduced. 
In any event, the discount for charging zone residents should be retained.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
